about_the_game:
The perfect soundtrack for your motorcycle cruises. If you plan to wreck some robots along the way - just tune in! This score includes all the tracks in Steel Rats™ composed by Arkadiusz Reikowski (Observer, Kholat, Layers of Fear) and Tomasz Pauszek.

Track list:
01. Steel Rats
02. Outskirts
03. Driving The Bikes
04. Olbarrow
05. Scrappers And Goons
06. The Broadcast
07. Burning Zeppelins
08. Lakeport
09. Spinners
10. Hanging Gardens
11. Abnormalities
12. Anchor Chase
13. Halcyon Isle
14. Old Town Factories
15. Hit 'Em Hard
16. Close To The End
17. The Hole
18. Toshi's Theme
detailed_description:
The perfect soundtrack for your motorcycle cruises. If you plan to wreck some robots along the way - just tune in! This score includes all the tracks in Steel Rats™ composed by Arkadiusz Reikowski (Observer, Kholat, Layers of Fear) and Tomasz Pauszek.

Track list:
01. Steel Rats
